name: Sex Story - Cuckold Life - Episode 2
description:
A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters, set in beautiful decor.
The first cuckold experience was a total blast, so Nikki takes the initiative and surprises her loving husband with another wild night - this time, by accepting a cocky bartender’s invitation to his place. Will Adam be excited by her plan?
Follow the Sex Story and find out!

GAME DESCRIPTION

Meet Nikki & Adam, and embark on their journey of spicing up their marital life in a brand new and wild cuckold Sex Story.

EPISODE 2
Nikki’s first sexcapade outside her marriage was a total blast for both her and her cuckold husband. The dirty videos and pictures she sent him boosted their sex life to another dimension.
But it’s been a while since that first time, and those pictures won’t last them a lifetime. So Nikki takes the initiative and surprises Adam with another wild night.
Horny and anxious to get naughty again, she accepts a cocky bartender’s invitation to have a private shot-tasting back at his place, leaving Adam naked and longing for sexual release.

Will Adam be excited to be a cuckold again?
Follow their Sex Story and find out!
